text: "World of Magic" is a 1995 song recorded by German eurodance act Pharao, which consists of Indian/German singer Kyra Pharao and American rapper Deon Blue. It was released in 1995 as their third single from the act's debut album, Pharao. "World of Magic" reached number 22 in Sweden and number 28 in Germany. On the Eurochart Hot 100, it peaked at number 97. ==Music video== The music video for "World of Magic" was directed by director John Clayton. He also directed the music video for the act's first single, "I Show You Secrets". ==Track listing== ==Chart performance== ===Weekly charts=== {|class="wikitable sortable" !Chart (1995) !Peak position |- |Europe (Eurochart Hot 100) |align="center"|97 |- |Germany (Media Control Charts) |align="center"|28 |- |Sweden (Sverigetopplistan) |align="center"|22 |- |} ==References== Category:1995 singles Category:1995 songs Category:Pharao songs Category:Dance Pool singles Category:Music videos directed by John Clayton
title: World of Magic
